attributes.action: change the law so Emotional support dogs have the same rights as service dogs
attributes.additional_details:
allow these amazing dogs to have the right to accompany their owners, to enable them to live in society . help them do the shopping go to apointments or even accompany them on holidays.
a short break to Butlins was not as relaxing for us as Ollie was refused due to having no paper work supporting his role as an Emotional support dog helping my GS when needed. This made things very stressful for my GS s and us.
attributes.background: Ollie is my grandsons emotional support dog,  and needs to be recognised as such in the eyes of the law, he has transformed his and our lives so much. My GS have many problems and is a school refuser since November last year, Ollie is slowly getting him back,

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action:  https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/607965
